text: <@U012PBG90SZ>, thanks brother this solve my problem!

Losing my mind over this one! I have a deal property that is set with a date-picker. This:
```{{ DEAL_PROPS.go_live_date }}```
It prints out:
```1686700800000```
If I do this:
```{{ DEAL_PROPS.go_live_date | format_datetime('EEE, MMM d, yyyy') }}```
Nothing prints at all. Same if I use ‘short’ within the filter. These are being used in a quote template.
Turns out the date was being returned as a string, not a number! Thanks <@UAWLEUX1U> for the help.
